CustomField.description: The Order Id is defined in DemandWare and used as a proxy to distinguish a specific RCO user session when browsing for and booking a class. The Order Id is presumed to remain static throughout the entire customer RCO session. The Order Id is used to identify a specific requestor for reserving/booking a class and allows the reservation service to be called multiple times during a single session (Idempotent).
CustomField.label: RCO Order Id
